casebody.data:
Steve LEIBOWITZ, an Individual; and Barbara Ann Strzelec, an Individual, Petitioners,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable William D. Kephart, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Sandra Hunt, an Individual, Real Party in Interest. No. 77377 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED DECEMBER 11, 2018

DENIED.
